mapper.select: select *,c.sp_name from clfb_cgcontract_performance a left join mode_status m on m.mode_id=a.p_id left join sourcing_purchasing c on c.sp_id=a.contract_yi where m.status=#{status}
mapper.update: update clfb_cgcontract_performance set cg_contract=#{c.cgContract}, cg_no=#{c.cgNo}, cj_contract=#{c.cjContract}, cj_no=#{c.cjNo}, task_no=#{c.taskNo}, prj_person=#{c.prjPerson}, contract_yi=#{c.contractYi}, fb_person=#{c.fbPerson}, contract_money=#{c.contractMoney}, provisional_money=#{c.provisionalMoney}, settlement_money=#{c.settlementMoney}, settlement_desc=#{c.settlementDesc}, accumulative_payment_money=#{c.accumulativePaymentMoney}, performance_grade=#{c.performanceGrade}, performance_desc=#{c.performanceDesc}, make_time=now() where p_id=#{c.pId}
